description.schinese: 为一个五行均衡的精怪塑体
description.tchinese: 为一个五行均衡的精怪塑体

description.english: Forge a body for a sentient spirit with 100% proportion of a certain element, choose a compatible Law for them, and promote them to Inner Disciple.
description.schinese: 为一个五行纯粹（某一项100%）的精怪塑体，并为其选择匹配的仙道功法，使其进入内门
description.tchinese: 为一个五行纯粹（某一项100%）的精怪塑体，并为其选择匹配的仙道功法，使其进入内门

description.english: Survive for 2 years without character dying with all Narrow Escape options activated.
description.schinese: 艰难逃离全部激活情况下无人死亡渡过两年
description.tchinese: 艰难逃离全部激活情况下无人死亡渡过两年

description.english: Survive for 1 year without character dying with all Harsh Weather options activated.
description.schinese: 恶劣环境全部激活情况下无人死亡渡过一年
description.tchinese: 恶劣环境全部激活情况下无人死亡渡过一年

description.english: Kill all monsters on starting map within the 1st year with all extra monsters activated.
description.schinese: 初始有4个妖兽情况下第一年内击杀地图上所有妖兽
description.tchinese: 初始有4个妖兽情况下第一年内击杀地图上所有妖兽

description.english: Construct Mini Universe within the 1st year with all Intricate Buildings options activated.
description.schinese: 艰难建设全部激活情况下一年内建造小乾坤界
description.tchinese: 艰难建设全部激活情况下一年内建造小乾坤界

description.english: Achieve a Blessed sect within the 1st year with all Lost Arts options activated.
description.schinese: 失传全部激活情况下第一年内门派规模达到洞天
description.tchinese: 失传全部激活情况下第一年内门派规模达到洞天

description.english: Construct Mini Universe within the 1st year with all Scarce Resources options activated.
description.schinese: 物资短缺全部激活情况下第一年内建造小乾坤界
description.tchinese: 物资短缺全部激活情况下第一年内建造小乾坤界

description.english: Take in a character with all General Stats above 5 with all Hard Times options activated.
description.schinese: 道衰之世全部激活情况下将一名基础属性均超过5的角色收入门派
description.tchinese: 道衰之世全部激活情况下将一名基础属性均超过5的角色收入门派

description.english: Buy an item of Tier 10 or above from a Traveling Merchant within the 1st year with all Mean Merchants options activated.
description.schinese: 生意难做全部激活情况下第一年内通过行商购买一件10阶以上的物品
description.tchinese: 生意难做全部激活情况下第一年内通过行商购买一件10阶以上的物品

description.english: Help a character achieve Primordial Spirit or equivalent cultivational states within a year with all Tao Disorder options activated.
description.schinese: 天道紊乱全部激活条件下第一年让一名角色达到元神期或对应境界
description.tchinese: 天道紊乱全部激活条件下第一年让一名角色达到元神期或对应境界

description.english: Kill a monster in Golden Core state or above with your spirit pet within the 1st year with all Frail Pets options activated.
description.schinese: 羸弱灵宠全部激活条件下第一年内让灵宠单独击杀一个金丹期或以上妖兽
description.tchinese: 羸弱灵宠全部激活条件下第一年内让灵宠单独击杀一个金丹期或以上妖兽

description.english: Gain max relationship with all Sects with Cold World Activated
description.schinese: 冰冷人间全部激活条件下与所有门派掌门好感度达到100
description.tchinese: 冰冷人间全部激活条件下与所有门派掌门好感度达到100

description.english: Kill all attacking Yaoguai on the 80th day.
description.schinese: 在群妖80天来袭的情况下将其击杀
description.tchinese: 在群妖80天来袭的情况下将其击杀

description.english: Kill the Cultivator Killer attacking on the 150th day.
description.schinese: 在修真杀手150天来袭的情况下将其击杀
description.tchinese: 在修真杀手150天来袭的情况下将其击杀

description.english: Don't let the Jiao-dragon show up within the first 200 days while the mysterious cavern appears on the 30th day, then kill the dragon.
description.schinese: 在神秘洞穴30天出现后200天内不让蛟龙出现，随后将其击杀
description.tchinese: 在神秘洞穴30天出现后200天内不让蛟龙出现，随后将其击杀

description.english: Don't let the Jiao-dragon show up within the first 200 days with all Ancient Awe options activated, then kill the dragon.
description.schinese: 在上古严威全部激活的情况下神秘洞穴出现后200天内不让龙出现，随后将其击杀
description.tchinese: 在上古严威全部激活的情况下神秘洞穴出现后200天内不让龙出现，随后将其击杀

description.english: Upgrade Main Halls of all areas and cities to Level 3 within 3 years with all Worldly Chores options activated.
description.schinese: 凡间琐事全部激活条件下三年之内让将所有地区和城市的主殿升到3级
description.tchinese: 凡间琐事全部激活条件下三年之内让将所有地区和城市的主殿升到3级

displayName.english: Immortals do not believe in tears

description.english: Buy an item of Tier 12 or above from a cultivational sect within the 1st year with all Cold Paradise options activated.
description.schinese: 冰冷仙界全部激活条件下第一年内从一个门派购买一件12阶的物品
description.tchinese: 冰冷仙界全部激活条件下第一年内从一个门派购买一件12阶的物品

description.english: Make all the sects surrender under the highest NPC sect power setting.
description.schinese: 在最高门派实力情况下让所有门派臣服
description.tchinese: 在最高门派实力情况下让所有门派臣服

description.english: Kill Jiao-dragon under the highest Jiao-dragon power setting.
description.schinese: 击杀最高实力下的蛟龙
description.tchinese: 击杀最高实力下的蛟龙

description.english: Kill Phoenix under the highest Phoenix power setting.
description.schinese: 击杀最高实力下的凶凤
description.tchinese: 击杀最高实力下的凶凤

description.english: Kill Torch Dragon under the highest Torch Dragon power setting.
description.schinese: 击杀最高实力下的烛龙
description.tchinese: 击杀最高实力下的烛龙

description.english: Defeat the enemies attacking at the 1000th day with It gets Harder option activated.
description.schinese: 在日渐艰难激活的情况下，击败第1000天前来的敌人
description.tchinese: 在日渐艰难激活的情况下，击败第1000天前来的敌人

description.english: Make a disciple ascend on or higher than Tribulation I difficulty.
description.schinese: 在一劫或以上真仙难度下让一名子弟飞升
description.tchinese: 在一劫或以上真仙难度下让一名子弟飞升

description.english: Make a disciple ascend on or higher than Tribulation IV difficulty.
description.schinese: 在四劫或以上真仙难度下让一名子弟飞升
description.tchinese: 在四劫或以上真仙难度下让一名子弟飞升

description.english: Make a disciple ascend on or higher than Tribulation VII difficulty.
description.schinese: 在七劫或以上真仙难度下让一名子弟飞升
description.tchinese: 在七劫或以上真仙难度下让一名子弟飞升

description.english: Conquer all sects on or higher than Tribulation I difficulty.
description.schinese: 在一劫或以上真仙难度下征伐所有门派
description.tchinese: 在一劫或以上真仙难度下征伐所有门派

description.english: Conquer all sects on or higher than Tribulation IV difficulty.
description.schinese: 在四劫或以上真仙难度下征伐所有门派
description.tchinese: 在四劫或以上真仙难度下征伐所有门派

description.english: Conquer all sects on or higher than Tribulation VII difficulty.
description.schinese: 在七劫或以上真仙难度下征伐所有门派
description.tchinese: 在七劫或以上真仙难度下征伐所有门派

description.english: Learn from a manual of Formations for the first time.
Learn an ancient formation for the first time.

displayName.english: Not as Many, but as One

description.english: Form a formation for the first time.
Form an ancient formation for the first time.
Assign an Agency to a disciple for the first time.
description.schinese: 第一次入驻凡间代理点
description.tchinese: 第一次入驻凡间代理点

description.english: Set up and assign Agencies in every city and area.
Gain more than 20000 Followers from a single Policy event.
description.schinese: 从一次政策事件中获得超过20000信徒
description.tchinese: 从一次政策事件中获得超过20000信徒

description.english: Make 40% or more of a city or area's population become your sect's follower.
description.schinese: 在一个城市或地区拥有超过40%信徒
description.tchinese: 在一个城市或地区拥有超过40%信徒

description.english: Make 40% or more of each city or area's population become your sect's follower.
description.schinese: 在所有城市和地区拥有超过40%的信徒数量
description.tchinese: 在所有城市和地区拥有超过40%的信徒数量

description.english: Take part in Auction for the first time.
Buy all the items in an Auction.
Buy the mysterious item in Auction.
description.schinese: 一次拍卖买下神秘物品
description.tchinese: 一次拍卖买下神秘物品

description.english: Bid with a price lower than market price and get the item being auctioned.
Bid with a price 10 times the market price or higher and get the item being auctioned.
description.schinese: 以10倍以上市场价拍下一件物品
description.tchinese: 以10倍以上市场价拍下一件物品

description.english: Trade with the Traveling Merchant for the first time.
Buy up a Traveling Merchant's Spirit Stone.
Gain 1 Connection from an NPC sect.
description.schinese: 让一个门派欠你1点人情
description.tchinese: 让一个门派欠你1点人情

description.english: Gain 10 Connection from a single NPC sect.
description.schinese: 让一个门派欠你10点人情
description.tchinese: 让一个门派欠你10点人情

description.english: Borrow a disciple for the first time.
Borrow 4 disciples at the same time, each from a different sect.
description.schinese: 同时租借4个其他门派的弟子
description.tchinese: 同时租借4个其他门派的弟子

description.english: Give a sect leader their favorite item as a gift when paying a formal visit.
description.schinese: 拜山时赠送掌门的心仪之物
description.tchinese: 拜山时赠送掌门的心仪之物

description.english: Enter a wilderness map for the first time.
Enter a sect's map for the first time.
Collect an item in a wilderness map for the first time.
description.schinese: 第一次在野外地图拾取物品
description.tchinese: 第一次在野外地图拾取物品

description.english: Grab a treasure in a sect's map while hiding.
description.schinese: 在门派地图以隐匿状态拿取宝物
description.tchinese: 在门派地图以隐匿状态拿取宝物

description.english: Conquer all the NPC sects and make 40% or more of each city or area's population become your sect's follower.
description.schinese: 征伐所有门派并在所有城市和地区拥有超过40%的信徒数量
description.tchinese: 征伐所有门派并在所有城市和地区拥有超过40%的信徒数量

description.english: Socialize with others for the first time.
Learn of someone's obsession for the first time.
description.schinese: 第一次了解到一个人的执念
description.tchinese: 第一次了解到一个人的执念

description.english: Take down someone's guard for the first time.
Invite someone to your sect for the first time.
description.schinese: 第一次邀请他人来我门派
description.tchinese: 第一次邀请他人来我门派

description.schinese: 将任意一个灵宠培养到完全体
description.tchinese: 将任意一个灵宠培养到完全体

description.english: Make a Yaoguai possessing 5 or more Intelligence Shards survive Shapeshifting Tribulation.
description.schinese: 让一个拥有5个以上灵智碎片的妖族度过化形天劫
description.tchinese: 让一个拥有5个以上灵智碎片的妖族度过化形天劫

description.english: Make a Yaoguai possessing 7 or more Intelligence Shards survive Shapeshifting Tribulation.
description.schinese: 让一个拥有7个以上灵智碎片的妖族度过化形天劫
description.tchinese: 让一个拥有7个以上灵智碎片的妖族度过化形天劫

description.english: Make a Yaoguai possessing 9 or more Intelligence Shards survive Shapeshifting Tribulation.
description.schinese: 让一个拥有9个以上灵智碎片的妖族度过化形天劫
description.tchinese: 让一个拥有9个以上灵智碎片的妖族度过化形天劫

description.english: Erect statue of belief in a city and connect it to a Shendao cultivator.
description.schinese: 在一座城市设立信仰雕像并与一个神修关联
description.tchinese: 在一座城市设立信仰雕像并与一个神修关联

description.schinese: 在聆听愿望时满足一个信徒的橙色愿望
description.tchinese: 在聆听愿望时满足一个信徒的橙色愿望

description.english: Level up a Sacred Relic to Tier 15.
description.schinese: 将一个信仰圣物升到15阶
description.tchinese: 将一个信仰圣物升到15阶

description.english: Expand your divine realm by surviving detachment tribulation.
description.schinese: 利用斩念劫扩张1次神国
description.tchinese: 利用斩念劫扩张1次神国

description.english: Reach the highest mental state of Shendao cultivation.
description.schinese: 神修心境达到最高境界
description.tchinese: 神修心境达到最高境界

description.schinese: 习得《九天应元雷声普化玉书》
description.tchinese: 习得《九天应元雷声普化玉书》

description.english: Establish a Divine Realm using Sutra of Celestial Thunder.
description.schinese: 以《九天应元雷声普化玉书》开辟神国
description.tchinese: 以《九天应元雷声普化玉书》开辟神国

description.english: Achieve the maximum size possible when establishing Divine Realm using Sutra of Celestial Thunder.
description.schinese: 以《九天应元雷声普化玉书》开辟神国时就达到48圆满
description.tchinese: 以《九天应元雷声普化玉书》开辟神国时就达到48圆满

description.tchinese: 以《九天应元雷声普化玉书》飞升

description.schinese: 以《诸天八部成就法》开辟神国

description.english: Achieve the maximum size possible when establishing Divine Realm using Sutra of Eight Cosmos.

description.tchinese: 以《诸天八部成就法》开辟神国时就达到48圆满

description.tchinese: 以《诸天八部成就法》飞升

description.schinese: 习得《幽冥十方太乙救苦经》
description.tchinese: 习得《幽冥十方太乙救苦经》

description.tchinese: 以《幽冥十方太乙救苦经》开辟神国时就达到48圆满

description.schinese: 通过吐纳获得太虚精华
description.tchinese: 通过吐纳获得太虚精华

description.schinese: 通过吐纳获得玄天紫气
description.tchinese: 通过吐纳获得玄天紫气

description.schinese: 通过吐纳获得九阳真华
description.tchinese: 通过吐纳获得九阳真华

description.schinese: 通过吐纳获得玄月真精
description.tchinese: 通过吐纳获得玄月真精

description.english: Activate secret body for the first time.

description.schinese: 习得《太古形意六合真体》
description.tchinese: 习得《太古形意六合真体》

description.english: Ascend with Body of Primordial Unity.
description.schinese: 以《太古形意六合真体》飞升
description.tchinese: 以《太古形意六合真体》飞升

description.english: Ascend with Body of Barbarous Forging.
Ascend with Body of Ancestral Yaoguai.
Ascend with Body of Fallen Obliteration.
Ascend by studying Sutra of Nether Salvation.
description.schinese: 以《幽冥十方太乙救苦经》飞升
description.tchinese: 以《幽冥十方太乙救苦经》飞升

description.english: Know the truth of the world
Transform a panda into human and successfully help it ascend toward immortality.
description.schinese: 让一只貊化形为人，并让其成功飞升
description.tchinese: 让一只貊化形为人，并让其成功飞升

description.english: Catch a Spirit Stone while fishing.
Catch a fish weighed more than 25 catties.
description.schinese: 钓上来一条重达25斤的鱼
description.tchinese: 钓上来一条重达25斤的鱼

description.english: Obtain all the secret treasures from the steles in Purple Cloud Palace
description.schinese: 在紫霄宫中获得所有碑文秘藏。
description.tchinese: 在紫霄宫中获得所有碑文秘藏。

description.english: Cultivate the Law of Nimbus Conquest with over 150% of compatibility
description.schinese: 以150%以上的匹配度修炼《玄天真武两仪妙道》
description.tchinese: 以150%以上的匹配度修炼《玄天真武两仪妙道》

description.english: Shape the Tier I Golden Core with the Law of Nimbus Conquest
description.schinese: 以《玄天真武两仪妙道》功法结成一品金丹
description.tchinese: 以《玄天真武两仪妙道》功法结成一品金丹
